short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tracks your overall expenses online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension "Expense Tracker" manages your online expenses. You can set your annually/monthly/ weekly
expenditure limit. If you cross that limit - you will get notification.
